name: RoboSports VR
description: RoboSports is a vast collection of online multiplayer sports games!Our first game, “Crazy Dodgeball”, is all about attacking your opponent with an energy ball to score points. Dodge your opponent’s throws or go for the catch and land a devastating counter-attack!Play in an arena like no other!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Vive HMD and controllers
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7 or higher Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Vive HMD and controllers
